DOC.brief_title: Effect Acetazolamide & Position CSF Leakage Collection Wound Dehiscence
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate effect Acetazolamide administration prone position follow lumbosacral spinal surgery prevent cerebro-spinal fluid leakage collection wound dehissence child admit Children Medical Center Tehran since Autumn 2012 end winter 2015.The study run 4 category intervention : - Group A : Acetazolamide administration 10 day - Group B : prone position 10 day - Group C : Acetazolamide administration prone position 10 day - Group D : intervention All patient randomly assign group patient face complication , protocol change Acetazolamide administration prone position patient consider failure protocol .
